title: Carrier Systems Engineer
summary: The people here at Apple create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it. Apple’s Carrier sales organization generates revenue to enrich the lives of millions of people around the world. The Carrier System Engineering team supports Carrier Sales organization to deliver on the promise of the Apple platform to B2B customers.
description: The Carrier System Engineer solves technical and business problems with Carrier partners to ensure success for Apple and its customers. They provide technical pre-sales and consultation to ensure Carrier partners deliver best-in-class Apple practices and solutions for B2B customers at scale. The role includes deeply understanding Carrier businesses and their technical ambitions, and advising to enhance sales revenue and ensure customer happiness.
preferred_qualifications: Strive for excellence in everything you do. Able to build driven and breakthrough strategies to enhance revenue and ensure customer satisfaction. Work well in collaborative environments...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $149,400 and $224,900 depending on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees receive benefits including comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, educational expense reimbursement, stock programs, and potential bonuses or commissions.
